comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; X11; Linux i686; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111115192257

Steps to reproduce:

Open new tab, type https://github.com/MrMEEE/bumblebee/commit/a047be85247755cdbe0acce6f1dafc8beb84f2ac in the address bar, select area with somebody's avatar (or just press Ctrl+A), click rmb and select "View selection source".


Actual results:

Window with source use all available RAM. Look at screenshot in attachment.


Expected results:

It must show selection source. Besides "View page source" works fine, and if select area without avatar it works well too.
comments.author: hope2013@mail.ru
